sentence.Network_en: She worked indefatigably and enthusiastically to interest the young in music.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了激发年轻人对音乐的兴趣，她一直孜孜不倦、积极热情地工作。

sentence.Network_en: AOBO - willing to create a beautiful future by working indefatigably with you!
sentence.Network_cn: 奥博(AOBO)愿以不懈的努力,与你共同演绎美好的未来!

sentence.Network_en: Pursue your object, be it what it will, steadily and indefatigably.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管追求什么目标, 都应坚持不懈.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 | 正方翻译网 ... ... indefatigable 不知疲倦的 indefatigably 不厌倦地 indefeasibility 难使无效.
美国大学翻译中文 3 - geovindu的日志 -... ... 不知疲倦 inexhaustibility 不知疲倦地 indefatigably 不知羞耻地 shamelessly.
She watched the show indefatigably ., 她毫不厌倦地观看着演出.

list.abs: persistence 坚持不懈indefatigable desire 坚持不懈的渴望Persistence pays off! 坚持不懈能取得好结果！.
Conciliatory area passes Beijing indefatigable effort , economic society progress obtained apparent effect ., 北京市怀柔区经过不懈努力 , 经济社会发展取得了明显成效.
The indefatigable bell now sounded for the fourth time ., 那不知疲倦的钟声如今敲第四遍了.
He studied indefatigably ., 他孜孜不倦地学习.

entry.tran: 不倦的;不屈不挠的;坚持不懈的
entry.def: You use indefatigable to describe someone who never gets tired of doing something.

example.ex: His indefatigable spirit helped him to cope with his illness...
example.tran: 他不屈不挠的精神帮助他对抗病魔。

example.ex: He was indefatigable in his efforts to secure funding for new projects.
example.tran: 他不知疲倦地努力为新项目寻求资金。
